verses.roman:
mātaraḥ pitaraḥ putrā
bhrātaraḥ patayaś ca vaḥ
vicinvanti hy apaśyanto
mā kṛḍhvaṁ bandhu-sādhvasam

synonyms: mātaraḥ—mothers; pitaraḥ—fathers; putrāḥ—sons; bhrātaraḥ—brothers; patayaḥ—husbands; ca—and; vaḥ—your; vincinvanti—are searching; hi—certainly; apaśyantaḥ—not seeing; mā kṛḍhvam—do not create; bandhu—for your family members; sādhvasam—anxiety.
translation: Not finding you at home, your mothers, fathers, sons, brothers and husbands are certainly searching for you. Don't cause anxiety for your family members.
